name: Match-3-Heros
description:
Match-3-Heros

Is an Idle Game with Match 3 implemented to it, where the player has to successfully match 3 or more tiles to buff their heroes and the objective of the Game is to defeat the boss.

Instructions :

* Match the hero tiles to buff the respective hero

*Watch out for boss tiles, it end up buffing the boss!!!!

*Defeat the Boss
